ygData.subject: Re: Darkness Strikes
ygData.msgSnippet: In the debris from the battle with the Decepticons an owl awakens. (Thanks to all who tried to help.) Ice forced herself to stand. What the pit is going on?

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

In the debris from the battle with the Decepticons an owl awakens. (Thanks
to all who tried to help.) Ice forced herself to stand. "What the pit is
going on?" she asked herself scanning the situation. She heard the intruder
calling out to the Maximals. In other situations she would've stepped in but
the mutant was still weak from her mind wars with Surgital. transforming to
her robot mode she extended the owl wings on her back and flew skyward. The
Maximals were capable of handling themselves. Her former friends didn't need
her anymore. Setting a course for the mutants home she flew north. She hoped
Lunarpine would be there to comfort her.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Quickstrk7@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 20, 2001 4:47 PM
Subject: Darkness Strikes


> Outside Maximal City, The mysterious Infecticon being hovers above the
base,
> its eyes glowing a dark blue. It then sends a comm to the entire Maximal
> City. The staff in its hand begins to glow a dark red as energy begins to
> pour out from it and seems to spin around and form some kind of vortex,
bolts
> of energy striking some of the surrounding ground causing some explosions.
>
> ????: "All Maximals, I am offering you a chance to save yourselves from
> destruction. I challenge your strongest warrior to face me. Should they
lose
> you shall all become my minions. THose who will not submit shall be
> destroyed. If I lose, then I shall leave you all in peace. I shall give
you
> approximately twenty cycles to respond."
>
